text: Rishi Budhrani (born June 9, 1984) is a Singaporean stand-up comedian, actor and host. He began performing in 2009 and became the first Singaporean to perform at the Gotham Comedy Club in New York City and is the first stand-up comedian to host Singapore's National Day Parade in 2022. as well as the President's Star Charity in October 2023. Rishi has been featured on Comedy Central and CNA, and has headlined shows in Sydney, Dubai, India, China, Sri Lanka, and Melbourne, Australia. == References == Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Singaporean actors Category:Stand-up comedians
title: Rishi Budhrani
